message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will bring you a lot of value. I'm willing to offer it to you for $14,000. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm looking to pay a bit less.  I'm willing to offer $13,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking to pay a bit less, but I'm not willing to go as low as $13,000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'm counteroffering at $13,500. What do you think?
